show_name: Chūnibyō demo Koi ga Shitai! Lite (ONA)
other_title: Chu-2 Byo demo Koi ga Shitai! Lite (Japanese)
中二病でも恋がしたい! Lite (Japanese)
plot: From Rikka's slow descent into delusions to a brief introduction of the characters by Kumin, the lite episodes give additional coverage of the anime's characters.
ending_theme: "Shikkoku ni Odoru Haou Bushi" by ZAQ
